FuncDef:
The capture drop-packet forward-exception enable command enables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a forwarding exception.
The undo capture drop-packet forward-exception enable command disables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a forwarding exception. The capture drop-packet forward-exception enable command enables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a forwarding exception. The undo capture drop-packet forward-exception enable command disables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a forwarding exception. By default, the packet loss visualization function for the packets that are discarded due to a forwarding exception is disabled.
